Flygon (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0329: Vibrava
Pokémon
#0331: Cacnea →

Flygon has been featured on 23 different cards since it debuted in the EX Dragon expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Flygon cards are normally Fighting-type or Dragon-type Stage 2 Pokémon. As a Dragon-type, their attacks normally have costs including and Energy.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Flygon

Flygon
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
